name: Comet (Misterkuul)
description:
PLAYES BETTER IN THE APP

Welcome to our game called Comet, it's a Top-Down Shoot 'm Up.

Originally a school project, but now everybody can play it!

The game is designed to work for the SNES Controller, but also works keyboard and mouse. 

Controls:

Movement = WASD or Up Down Left Right

Shooting = SpaceBar

Advised Resolution = 1920x1080

Credits:
